main event: A rectangular-shaped silver object was sighted moving quickly in New Baden, Illinois on 18 September 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as rectangular-shaped, resembling a car without bumpers,It emitted a pink and red glow in one corner and a green and blue glow from the body,The observer, who was fishing, saw the object at an angle of elevation of 15 degrees,The sighting lasted for only 6 seconds before the object disappeared behind trees,There were no sounds associated with the sighting, despite the observer being slightly hard of hearing.
witness description: Senior electrician base engineer from Scott Air Force Base
